description: Enterprise techniques used by OSX/Shlayer, ATT&CK software S0402 v1.0
name: OSX/Shlayer (S0402)

techniques.comment: OSX/Shlayer can install malicious Safari browser extensions to serve ads.
OSX/Shlayer can base64-decode and AES-decrypt downloaded payloads.
OSX/Shlayer can disable Gatekeeper using the native spctl application.
OSX/Shlayer can escalate privileges to root by asking the user for credentials.
OSX/Shlayer can use the chmod utility to set a .app file as executable.
OSX/Shlayer executes a .command script from a hidden directory in a mounted DMG.
OSX/Shlayer can masquerade as a Flash Player update.
OSX/Shlayer can use bash scripts to check the macOS version and download payloads.
OSX/Shlayer can collect the macOS version and IOPlatformUUID.
OSX/Shlayer relies on users mounting and executing a malicious DMG file.
